author: Shudbefishin

review: First off I have to say I couldn't believe how easy this product was to install and setup with my home network, Less than ten minutes from the time I took it out of the package!  It has frozen a couple of times but not a big issue. So far I mostly used it with youtube and vevo. My only criticism, and truthfully probably on my lack of researching the product, is the limited availability of apps for my iPhone 5. I realize this is an Android based product but figure they would have had more apps and access to the webstore. Other than that this is a great product!
author: G. Alicea

review: works great in HD, easy to install. surprisingly cool. would recommend to anyone, anytime. We love the changing photographs in the background of the home screen. a very nice touch!

review: I bought this as a gift for my daughter for her relatively new TV.  She didn't want to replace a relatively new DVD player in order to stream Netflix, HULU or Pandora etc.  This little device turned her TV into a SMART TV and she loves it!!  She has recommended it to friends and saved them money by not having to buy additional devices to stream movies or listen to Apps.
author: W R Allen

review: It functions exactly as it says it should, but the requirements are vague and the supported app list is small. The device can output in 480i and 720P but it forces a resolution of 1080p after testing the other two on startup and my main TV does not support 1080p. Of course there isn't a current way to toggle into a different resolution and Google's customer service will resolve the issue as a TV older than four years and thus does not meet requirements of device. Also tab casting only works from the Google Chrome browser on a desktop/laptop computer, not from android, and there are a significant number of apps on the Google play store that claim to support Chromecast but list Chromecast support as to be enabled in a future update once Google allows the feature to be open to all third-party developers instead of just their chosen few.
